about_the_game:
Only Multiplayer: Up! Embark on an Online Multiplayer Urban Adventure

Prepare to defy gravity, leap across rooftops, and flip through the cityscape in the ultimate parkour jump simulator! Brace yourself for an exhilarating Online Multiplayer experience that lets you immerse in the heart-pounding world of parkour.

Leap, vault, and sprint through diverse urban landscapes, each presenting its own unique obstacles and challenges. Your journey through this non-stop obstacle course isn’t just a game; it’s a thrilling free-running odyssey.

Main Features:

🏙 Diverse Urban Landscapes: Dash and flip your way across a variety of city settings, each packed with distinctive challenges that demand your parkour finesse.
🎮 Online Multiplayer: Team up with friends or challenge parkour enthusiasts from around the world in real-time multiplayer mode.

🎯Intuitive Controls: Master the easy-to-use swipe controls to unlock your full parkour potential and become a true urban ninja.

🛠️ Customizable Items: Elevate your parkour game with an array of items and power-ups like Jetpacks, Wings, and Double Jump boots. Customize your character and dominate the skyline.

🏃 Thrilling Challenges: Conquer new obstacles, leap over gaps, and scale walls as you strategically navigate each level. Success isn’t just about speed; it’s about outsmarting the city.

🤝 Social Competition: Share your awe-inspiring high scores, challenge your friends, and see who emerges as the ultimate urban runner.

Only Multiplayer: Up isn’t just about reaching your destination; it’s about the exhilarating journey you take to get there. Every run presents an opportunity to innovate and push the boundaries of parkour.

Whether you’re a seasoned parkour pro or a newcomer to the world of free-running, Only Multiplayer: Up guarantees a captivating and accessible experience that’s hard to put down. Lace up your sneakers, join the multiplayer parkour craze, and always remember - in this game, the only way is UP!

name: Only Up!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Get set to defy gravity, leap like never before, and experience the exhilarating world of parkour in a whole new light! This isn’t just your ordinary parkour jump simulator - it’s a dynamic ONLINE MULTIPLAYER adventure that transforms your every move into a gravity-defying spectacle.
